fields.name: package_id
fields.description: Unique id of the items package

fields.name: user__feedback
fields.description: True if user recieved a feedback message during the annotation

fields.name: data__sentence1
fields.description: The first sentence with the selected word marked using xml-like tags.
fields.example: He was doing nothing at Dunton Green except a little <token>tailoring</token>.

fields.name: data__sentence2
fields.description: The second sentence with the selected word marked using xml-like tags.
fields.example: He was doing nothing at Dunton Green except a little <token>tailoring</token>.

fields.name: annotation__output
fields.description: Output decision created by the user

fields.name: annotation__time
fields.description: Time user spent on annotating this item

fields.name: reference__output
fields.description: Reference decision showing if tokens have a similar meaning

fields.name: feedback__output
fields.description: Decision showing if tokens have a similar meaning showed as a feedback. Doesn't need to be the same as the one from the `reference__output` field

fields.name: test_group
fields.description: Defines the test conditions in which this annotation was created (e.g. low quality feedback)
